data.message: Funny I host a radio station and play music and Facebook will block me, but ......I can upload from YouTube or somewhere else and it's kool. Same thing just not live. Now Facebook won't block, "Facebook let's advertisers exclude users by race".. Wow. It is law not too yet for over a year Facebook has continually allowed this to happen,  but... not me to live music being played while I host my station..
